p.k: 73% New. A Handful of Coins The brutal murder of a loving mother leaves detectives baffled and a community outraged, until an unlikely eyewitness provides a vital clue

Devoy Lieutenant Joe Kenda makes a controversial decision during a murder investigation. His choice riles his team, but will his instincts prove right?
81% House of Horrors/Final Sacrifice Two young men are victims of a hammer attack in Tulsa. Meanwhile, in Atlanta, a man is murdered after a selfless act
81% The Ties That Bind When a man is gunned down with an AK-47 in his home, Atlanta detective Kevin Leonpacher discovers the victim's wife holds a dark secret

Last Call Detectives begin a desperate hunt for evidence when the body of a 24-year-old student is found dumped in a Brooklyn neighbourhood
77% Documentary examining the fatal stabbing of 21-year-old motorist Stephen Cameron during an altercation on the M25 in 1996

Loose Cannon Lt Joe Kenda looks back at his hunt for a shooter whose rampage left a 24-year-old woman dead and her two-year-old child seriously wounded
A Killer Always Rings Twice Detective Kenda investigates two murders in the same apartment block. Are they linked? And if so, can he catch the culprit?
